segments.text: What a cute scene in this kitchen, almost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are trying to get cookies from the jar without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, reaching up so determinedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip over any moment, and he'd come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting, her arm stretched out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over at the sink, the woman's busy with the dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not noticing the water overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring out and puddling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe must be soaked, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast makes me worry about the kids' safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
